statements: SELECT * FROM StudentProgress ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, score ASC;
SELECT student_id, assessment_name FROM StudentProgress WHERE score > 80;
SELECT assessment_name, score FROM StudentProgress WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT student_id, assessment_name, score FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM StudentProgress GROUP BY assessment_name;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 1 AND assessment_date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM StudentProgress GROUP BY assessment_name HAVING AVG(score) > 80;
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score, MIN(score) AS lowest_score, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE assessment_name LIKE '%exam%' ORDER BY assessment_date ASC, score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id, COUNT(assessment_name) AS total_assessments FROM StudentProgress GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(assessment_name) >= 3 ORDER BY total_assessments DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade BETWEEN 70 AND 90;
SELECT student_name, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM Students JOIN Assessments ON Students.student_id = Assessments.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 90;
SELECT student_name, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM Students INNER JOIN Assessments ON Students.student_id = Assessments.student_id;
SELECT student_name, student_grade, assessment_score FROM Students LEFT JOIN Assessments ON Students.student_id = Assessments.student_id WHERE assessment_score < 70;
SELECT student_name, MAX(assessment_score) AS highest_score FROM Students INNER JOIN Assessments ON Students.student_id = Assessments.student_id GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY highest_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrolled_year FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT assessment_name, score FROM assessments WHERE assessment_id > 5;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, assessment_id, score FROM students JOIN assessments ON students.student_id = assessments.student_id WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrolled_year FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE assessment_id > 5 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM courses WHERE course_id < 10 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, assessment_name, score FROM students JOIN assessments ON students.student_id = assessments.student_id;
SELECT student_name, enrolled_year, course_name FROM students JOIN assessments ON students.student_id = assessments.student_id JOIN courses ON assessments.score < 80;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM students WHERE student_grade = 'A';
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_type FROM assessments WHERE assessment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, assessment_id, score FROM student_scores WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM progress_records WHERE progress_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY progress_date ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM students WHERE student_grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE assessment_type = 'Midterm' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;

SELECT student_name, assessment_name, score FROM students JOIN student_scores ON students.student_id = student_scores.student_id JOIN assessments ON student_scores.assessment_id = assessments.assessment_id WHERE score > 80;
SELECT * FROM progress_records WHERE progress_status = 'Completed' AND progress_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(score) AS max_score, MIN(score) AS min_score FROM student_scores GROUP BY assessment_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT subject_name, teacher_name FROM subjects WHERE teacher_name = 'Mr. Smith';
SELECT student_id, assessment_date, subject, score FROM assessments WHERE score > 80;
SELECT teacher_name, department FROM teachers ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM students
SELECT subject_name, teacher_name FROM subjects
SELECT student_id, assessment_date, subject, score FROM assessments
SELECT teacher_name, department FROM teachers
